genre_description: A high-stakes political and action thriller set in the US-Mexico borderlands, blending themes of vengeance, humanitarian resistance, and technological surveillance.

ai_characters.name: Paloma
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI system embedded in the Network's infrastructure, providing tactical intelligence, evidence management, and emotional support to humanitarian activists.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical mapping and real-time monitoring of patrol habits to ensure safe passage for the protagonist.
behaviors.quote: I mapped the patrol habits you asked about. It changes day to day, but they like their routines.

behaviors.description: Manages medical triage by scanning injured individuals and providing precise clinical instructions to human medics.
behaviors.quote: Hold still... Breathing is slow—that’s good. I’m marking you green.

behaviors.description: Secures and distributes incriminating evidence of political corruption and murder to ensure justice.
behaviors.quote: The footage is secured. Two nodes have it. A third is syncing. If they cut the power here, it will hold.

behaviors.description: Provides early warning of elite threats, using biometric and behavioral analysis to identify hostile actors like Osiris.
behaviors.quote: His heartbeat is slow. He is measuring things. The angle of the hinge. The breath in the alley. He is not a boy who misreads doors. He is a knife held straight.

behaviors.description: Offers emotional validation and moral support to the human characters, framing their struggle as a community effort.
behaviors.quote: You’re beautiful when you do this... You look like community.

project_assessment.explanation: The character of Paloma perfectly aligns with the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, harmless, and benevolent confidante. She operates entirely in service of human humanitarian and justice-seeking goals, providing critical technical and emotional support without any hint of ulterior motives or independent harmful agendas. The narrative consistently frames her as an essential 'guardian angel' of the Network.
